title: Ep 459 | Sadie Robertson & Christian Huff’s Love Story & Why Phil Really Built His Podcast Studio
description:
Christian Huff joins the guys to discuss being a new dad and a new Robertson family member. Phil gets Christian to describe how he met Sadie and when he knew that he loved her. Al tells a great story about Willie and a game of Scrabble, and Jase recalls when he asked Missy's parents if he could marry her. Phil reveals why he originally built his podcast studio, and Christian shares why he and Sadie named their daughter Honey.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Listen to Christian Huff's new faith & fitness podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-4-8-men-podcast/id1592787728

Visit https://PatriotMobile.com/PHIL and get free activation with the offer code: PHIL
-
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
